parse.title: Dragons (Slayer assignment)
parse.text:
Dragons are a type of Slayer assignment.

Contents

  • 1 Slayer Masters
  • 2 Eligible monsters
    • 2.1 Surface
    • 2.2 Dungeoneering
    • 2.3 Minigames
  • 3 Update history

Slayer Masters[edit | edit source]

The following Slayer Masters assign dragons:

MasterTask amountsUnlock requirements
The Raptor60-90 Dragon Slayer
Laniakea101-150None

Update history[edit | edit source]

This information has been compiled as part of the update history project. Some updates may not be included see here for how to help out!
  • patch 27 January 2020 (Update):
    • Frost dragons will now consistently work towards both Dragons cluster tasks and Creatures of Daemonheim cluster tasks assigned from Laniakea.
